item.title: [Close This]
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:44, topic:526298”][quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=645041.msg4343793#msg4343793 date=1375556613]

[quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=645041.msg4343767#msg4343767 date=1375554288]

[quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=645041.msg4342039#msg4342039 date=1375298334]

is this made in visiual basic 2010 too?!
[/quote]then every1 is breaking the copyright and looool u can make game like runescape but u cant put everything the same as them so this isnt caled breaking the copyright

oooo ok thx
[/quote][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=645041.msg4343765#msg4343765 date=1375553957]

I agree with Skrillex_Craft, the host can do what he wants. He can add P0RN models into teh server if he wants to!
[size=1pt]what a fail of a server this is…[/size]
[/quote]they are complaining about how i made the rocks and ladder and on the wall in varock cave there should be a stair following java nub but it isnt a stair those are hobbels or whatever u call it and atm updating the template of the site

ikr, they so jelly, them haters. You iz a bawz!
[/quote]@Lil_Smok3r want to join give me a ring

@ Drubrkleteren wasnt meant for u was meant for java nub and like i said already nah not made in vb made in notepad ++

o ok[/quote]But i can work with visual basic

item.title: [Close This]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Skrillex_Craft, post:26, topic:526298”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=645041.msg4342065#msg4342065 date=1375299623]
Any modification of the original RuneScape game client is considered to be copyright infringement. Usually Jagex doesn’t make any threats unless a noticeable profit is being made by taking “donations” on a server with an active player base.
[/quote]still a host can choose how and what he wants on his server and the java noob guy is telling me that i have to change it to his wills looool[/quote]
What type of a server owner…

Read full topic

item.title: [Close This]
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:29, topic:526298”][quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=645041.msg4342080#msg4342080 date=1375300340]

[quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=645041.msg4342076#msg4342076 date=1375300041]

[quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=645041.msg4342071#msg4342071 date=1375299840]

Any modification of the original RuneScape game client is considered to be copyright infringement. Usually Jagex doesn’t make any threats unless a noticeable profit is being made by taking “donations” on a server with an active player base.
[/quote]still a host can choose how and what he wants on his server and the java noob guy is telling me that i have to change it to his wills looool

He was offering constructive advice to make your server look more professional, and you responded with illiterate ramblings.
[/quote]i said to him i like it as it is now and then he was trolling about those (so called bugs) that arnt even bugs and if you see the picture where he said that there is a staircase while this isnt even a staircase if you look good then u see what it is
[/quote]No, he is not trolling. Those are graphical bugs. He also clearly stated why you should fix them, however, I’ll assume you’re just like the majority of these server owners now and are too lazy to fix them and now you’re just saying that you like it that way.[/quote]i like it as it is and i dont gonna change stuff now otherwise i will let the server crash… and lol if you have a server and i find things that arnt like i want it then i gonna post your whole topic full of those stink bug problems (even when they arnt bugs)

Read full topic
